channel.title: Comments on: SocialDevCamp East Was All About The Future Of The Web

item.title: By: Sony
item.dc:creator: Sony
item.description: One thing is certain: yesterday was a big success and it affirmed our belief that there is a need for exactly this kind of event and community in our region. We will be planning a second event, SocialDevCamp East Fall 2008, for September.
item.content:encoded: One thing is certain: yesterday was a big success and it affirmed our belief that there is a need for exactly this kind of event and community in our region. We will be planning a second event, SocialDevCamp East Fall 2008, for September.

item.title: By: SocailDevCamp East Fall Edition Is Coming! » Conference, Local » Russell Heimlich

item.description: [...] at the University of Baltimore’s Thumel Business Center Building. If it is anything like the first SocialDevCamp East then expect to meet lots of interesting people and sit in on a bunch of great [...]

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Thanks I was afraid it might be too wordy and too geeky. See you at Refresh DC tonight. Any details on BarCampDC 2?
item.content:encoded: Thanks I was afraid it might be too wordy and too geeky. See you at Refresh DC tonight. Any details on BarCampDC 2?

item.title: By: Justin Thorp
item.dc:creator: Justin Thorp
item.description: Thanks for the recap. I didn't end up making it out to the event so I've been really enjoying reading everyone's blog posts. Hope to see you soon.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the recap. I didn’t end up making it out to the event so I’ve been really enjoying reading everyone’s blog posts. Hope to see you soon.
